REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Authorizes the council on the arts to designate Little Panama as a cultural district
Summary: Authorizes the council on the arts to designate Little Panama as a cultural district in the city of New York located on Franklin Avenue between from its intersection with President Street to its intersection with Bergen Street.
LawCode: Amd ยง3.05, Arts & Cul L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to authorizing the council on the arts to designate Little Panama as a cultural district
